rev.desc.rev.desc: added a new start panel to set the query. Changed to query to:
removed the spaces. on the select panel $L.query is used now instead of the actual query itself.

Changed query on select panel so that it is using the Character representation for the problem number in the select. THis will eliminate the message being received in the sc.log about a bad query field.

descript.descript: added a new start panel to set the query. Changed to query to:
removed the spaces. on the select panel $L.query is used now instead of the actual query itself.

Changed query on select panel so that it is using the Character representation for the problem number in the select. THis will eliminate the message being received in the sc.log about a bad query field.
